Author: getlewt
Title: [ANN][ICO] LEWT - Monetize Your Media
Body: LEWT - Monetize Your Media  We have heard the calls from content creators who are finding it increasingly difficult to make a living from ad revenue and other online streams of income. The Lewt technology enables anyone to monetize any content on their website or on the GetLewt platform with little effort. The Lewt token is used to tip content creators and get paid for premium content and services you offer. Read more about Lewt in our technical white paper.  After over a year in development, our MVP is now available as the first milestone towards implementing our longterm vision of building the best tools for monetizing digital content on the internet. View the video on our website to see how to tip YouTube videos imported into the GetLewt platform, or explore this gallery for yourself by clicking the view gallery link below.  The Lewt ICO launches on the 15th of September, 2017 @ 6:00am CDT.  Official ICO website https://www.lewt.it  Technical White Paper https://github.com/dlundh/Lewt/blob/master/TechnicalWhitePaper.md  Token Distribution https://github.com/dlundh/Lewt/blob/master/LewtTokenDistribution.md  View Demo Gallery http://www.getlewt.com/gallery/secureteam10
